text: (Lo! is it not unto Allah that belongeth whosoever is in the heavens and whosoever is in the earth) of created beings and He changes them as He wills? (Those who follow) worship (aught instead of Allah follow not) worship not ((His) partners) gods in the form of idols. (They follow) they worship (only a conjecture) by means of conjecture, and have no certainty (and they) i.e. the leaders of the disbelievers (do but guess) they lie to those who are lowly among them.
